alert.note: Alert for Coastal San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Patricio County through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gregory, or near Portland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ingleside, Aransas Pass and Gregory. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 636 and 638. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
